bullish_factors: Strong Q4 earnings beat: EPS $2.40 vs $2.15 expected
RSI(14) at 42 suggesting oversold bounce potential
Support held at $232 with increasing volume
bearish_factors: iPhone revenue declined 2% in Greater China
Broader tech sector weakness amid rate concerns
decisions.rationale: AAPL showing relative strength post-earnings with services momentum offsetting hardware concerns. Technical setup favorable for swing entry with defined risk at $225 support.

plan_rationale: Single instrument entry: AAPL swing trade capitalizing on post-earnings momentum. Position sized at 5% of portfolio with 5.7% stop loss for 1.2R risk.
